post.summary: Initiate user registration and send OTP

200.description: Registration initiated. OTP sent to your email.

message.example: Registration initiated. OTP sent to your email.

409.description: User already logged in on this device

message.example: You have already logged in on this device.

post.summary: Refresh the access token using a refresh token

parameters.name: Device-ID
parameters.description: The device ID associated with the user session

requestBody.description: No body required. The headers must include 'Refresh-Token' and 'Device-ID'.

post.summary: Logout a user and invalidate tokens

parameters.name: Device-ID
parameters.description: The device ID associated with the user's session

post.summary: Resend the OTP to the user's email during registration

email.description: The email address used for registration.

post.summary: Validate OTP and complete user registration

otp.description: The OTP sent to the user's email.

email.description: The email associated with the OTP.

200.description: OTP validated successfully, and registration completed.

422.description: Session expired or registration data missing.

message.example: An error occurred. Please try again later.

post.summary: Add a product to a store
post.description: Adds a new product to a store by the store's owner

401.description: Unauthorized to add product to this store

message.example: You are not authorized to add a product to this store.

post.summary: Update a product in a store
post.description: Update product details for a store. Only accessible by users with the store_admin role who own the store.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: ID of the product to be updated

message.example: You are not authorized to update a product in this store

404.description: Product not found or Store Not found

delete.summary: Delete a product from a store
delete.description: Allows a store admin to delete a specific product from their store.

message.example: The product was successfully deleted from the store.
You are not authorized to delete this product.

404.description: Product not found or Store not found

message.example: The product was not found in this store.

post.summary: Assign a role to a user
post.description: Assign a specific role to a user. Only accessible by managers.

user_id.description: The ID of the user to whom the role will be assigned

post.summary: Revoke a role from a user
post.description: Revoke a specific role from a user. Only accessible by managers.

user_id.description: The ID of the user from whom the role will be revoked

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of stores with their details, including manager, name, image URL, location, and description.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: The number of items to display per page

post.description: Creates a new store with the given details. The user must provide valid data, including a logo image, via multipart/form-data.

logo.description: Image file for the store logo (jpg, png, jpeg)

message.example: You already have a store and cannot create another one.
Only store admin can create a store

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific store by its ID.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: ID of the store to retrieve

post.description: Update details of an existing store. Only authorized users can update their own stores. The request supports partial updates, including an optional logo file upload.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: ID of the store to update

logo.description: Optional image file for the store logo (jpg, png, jpeg)

403.description: Forbidden - User not authorized to update this store

message.example: You are not authorized to update this store.

delete.description: Delete a store by its ID.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: ID of the store to delete

message.example: You are not authorized to delete this store.

get.summary: Get a list of all users
Get details of a specific user

post.summary: Upload a profile image for a user
